title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to create chaos in Gotham.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, and more through the eyes of Forrest.

title: Inception
description: A thief steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy the One Ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: The fellowship is broken but the quest continues.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The final battle for Middle-earth and the destruction of the One Ring.

title: Interstellar
description: A team travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General seeks revenge for the murder of his family.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub crown prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in a rivalry to create the ultimate illusion.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory and clashes with a perfectionist teacher.

title: The Intouchables
description: After becoming a quadriplegic, a man hires a young caretaker from the projects.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten a newly formed symbiotic relationship.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham, a failed comedian descends into madness and emerges as a villain.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble again.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old falls in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an imprisoned cannibal to catch a serial killer.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of soldiers go behind enemy lines.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly accidentally travels back in time and meets his parents.

title: The Green Mile
description: A death row guard discovers a miracle among the inmates.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland, Oskar Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: Braveheart
description: Scottish warrior leads rebellion against English tyranny.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence influences the father.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max helps a woman escape a tyrant.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to take his throne and defend his nation.

title: Frozen
description: When the kingdom of Arendelle is trapped in eternal winter, sisters embark on a journey.

title: Moana
description: A young navigator sets sail to save her island and discover herself.

title: Coco
description: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to uncover family secrets.

title: Inside Out
description: Young girl's emotions come to life to help her navigate life.

title: Toy Story
description: Toys come to life when humans aren't around.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish sets out to find his missing son.

title: Up
description: An old man and a young boy embark on an adventure in a floating house.

title: Wall-E
description: A robot cleans up a deserted Earth and finds love.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat dreams of becoming a chef in Paris.
